medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Ten Views of Fuji: Sunrise
marks:
Signature, Title, Marks, and Inscription

Left m LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LRC, in pencil: [Hiroshi Y
description: brilliant yellow and orange colors peeking through the clouds at the horizon in upper center; clouds and rocks in foreground; at LL, a group of men in white clothes with hats ascend a rocky cliff
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
